entry.title: Good new start
entry.content:
I want only content, minimal script, minimal CSS, minimal images. So I’ve chosen this theme: Apollo.

Escape from the Bigs

Nowadays, we almost spent all time on those Big Internet Platforms: Facebook, Google Search, Gmail, Whatsapp, Instagram,… We have no time to browse anyone’s blog. Or we need someone posted on those Internet Platforms, push us to see. We lack the ability to explore others, we only do the search by distorted search engine.

I am trying, tried, to avoid. I know, but just can’t. I tried to build guestbook using CGI programs from others, learnt HTML and upload to Geocities, tried build WordPress on many free web-hosting. Only little still alives.

We see Photobuckets changed to paid service for 3rd party website to link to the images.

Here git, with static page generator, could be brought to anywhere.

Furthermore, I am tired about the advertisement, banners, covering the page. I want only content, minimal script, minimal CSS, minimal images. So I’ve chosen this theme: Apollo.

Ngau Tau Kok Estate (Upper) (oktak, 2017)
